column1: bit of inswing for the left-handed Masvaure on length and well outside off, he leans forward and pushes it to point
on the leg stump now, he blocks with a straight bat
outside the leg stump, just short of good length, he tucks it towards midwicket
flicked away for four off the pads from good length, he's off the mark in style. Pitched up on the pads, he flicked it uppishly after some inswing and beat fine leg behind square
angling into the pads, flicks it along the ground now for a single
well outside off, hint of away swing and he lets it go easily
angles it away from just outside off, he shoulders arms
thick inside edge to midwicket as he drives the length delivery into the off side but doesn't middle it
bit of inswing towards the off stump, he punches that down with hard hands but doesn't quite middle it again
good length ball on middle and leg, he defends it to the leg side. He's shaping it in nicely
exciting straight drive from Masvaure but Rajitha sticks his right leg out and saves four. It was pitched up, he drove hard and straight down the ground but the bowler did well to stop it
angles it away from the left-hander, well outside off and left alone
hint of outswing on the off stump, pretty full, and he blocks it with his head down
on good length now, outside off with away swing and he lets it go. Pretty good bounce there for Lakmal
makes him play this time with a better length and tighter line, Kasuza pokes and finds point
drives and misses! That tempting length outside off, he could have left it alone but chases and survives
on the off stump now, leans into the ball and defends with the straight bat
back of length outside off with good bounce, left alone easily
full toss outside off, he drives but finds cover. Should have got that away
bangs in a bouncer this time and Masvaure ducks under it
fuller and much wider with the angle, easy leave
nice and tight on good length just outside off, hint of inswing and that's a close leave
wider outside the off stump again, on good length but left alone
errs towards the leg side now, not much bounce and past the bat and pad
bangs in a short one just outside off, he shoulders arms nicely. Really good bounce there for Lakmal
on length outside off, he reaches out and defends into the covers
wider outside off with outswing, easy leave for Kasuza
pitched up outside off, he makes him play this time and Kasuza pushes it towards cover point
not much movement this time, on length around the fifth stumps line. He leans forward and leaves
not off the mark yet as Lakmal targets the off stump now. Kasuza blocks on the off side
angles it in towards the stumps, he tucks it to leg with a thick inside edge
goes for the bouncer and he ducks under it easily
towards the batsman from wide of the crease, Masvaure uses the angle and gets a single to leg
outside off, some away swing there and he shoulders arms
some movement and he squares up Kasuza a bit. On middle and off and straightening it a little bit, he looked to play it to leg initially but was opened up a bit with the late adjustment
thick outside edge rolls towards third slip. Drivable length outside off, he leans forward and does well to use soft hands and only pushes at it which makes the ball lose some pace
chases and misses! From wide of the crease and back of length, Masvaure wanted to punch it off the back foot but the ball had enough bounce to go over his bat outside off
wider outside off and left alone easily
shoulders arms this time, he lets this one go to the keeper from length outside off
goes for the stumps now, on middle and leg, and the length is workable to nudge it to leg

off the mark in Test cricket with a gentle poke outside off for four! It wasn't a bad delivery and Kasuza used his soft hands again for the ball outside off, it took a thick outside edge and rolled away past the slips
back of length around off now, he stays back and defends it back
two slips in place but he errs down the leg side
much better from Rajitha. Swings it in from outside towards off, the batsman watches it go to the keeper
stifled appeal from the keeper after Masvaure takes the ball on his pads but it's going down leg
a bouncer from wide of the crease with some shape into him, he ducks under it in time
short ball with a lot of room outside off, he taps it wide of point in the gap for two
coming in from wide outside off, he blocks it back
outside the off stump on back of length, swings away and he leaves it alone
touch closer to the stumps with some outswing, still left for the keeper
straight bat offered for the tight delivery around off
bit of shape around middle and leg, tucked to leg for one
slightly wide outside off on length, drives away from the body and finds cover
angles it away from off stump line, back of length and left on both line and length
pitches it up around middle and leg, he leans forward and blocks
even fuller on the stumps now, he defends on the off side now
pretty full on off, driven down to mid off
pulls the length shorter, it turns a bit and Kasuza defends on off again
another forward lean to block this off the front foot
fullish on off, leans into the ball and blocks with his straight bat
not too far from off, tight line outside off and Masvaure shoulders arms carefully
bangs it in short now, Masvaure hops on his toes and defends well
pitches around off, it has the angle to go away and Masvaure lets it go again. Good awareness of the off stump
pretty wide outside off, it's on short of length and left alone easily
angling it in towards the stumps now, Masvaure stays back to cover the stumps and defends with a straight bat
good length, angling in from outside off, he leans into it and pushes the ball into the covers
flighted on middle and leg, driven down to mid-on
nicely flighted on off stump, on length, and he blocks it back
pitches it well outside off now, looked quicker, and he defends it there
lot of flight, it's overpitched too and Kasuza drills it between the umpire and his batting partner, all along the ground for a crisp boundary
full delivery on leg, driven away to midwicket off the legs
much better to end the over: the perfect length to make the ball turn outside off before it reaches the batsman, who is also tempted to reach out to it. Defends well in the end
short ball with width, Masvaure punches it away in the gap beyond point and gets two
bangs the ball in on short of length around off, he defends it back
short of length and outside leg, worked off the hips for one to fine leg
angling in towards the abdomen, he helps it to fine leg for one
on the leg side again, worked away easily towards midwicket for one more
nice and tight on length towards off stump. Tight technique too, to defend it back
shorter and sliding in at off, Masvaure goes back and defends to the leg side
slower through the air and outside off, down the track and patted down the ground with the spin
short and wide outside off, jumps on the back foot and flays it away through the covers
tossed on off, dead-batted away
tossed on off, defended
fended to gully off an outside edge
short, wide, Masvaure reaches out for the ball and carves it over the top of gully with an outside edge
back of a length on off, defended
shortish on off, defended
pushed through and attacking off stump, defended
shorter and outside off, spins away a wee bit, chopped off the back foot to point
tossed up liberally on off stump, defended
defended off the front foot

short and ducking in from around the wicket, Masvaruare takes his eyes off the ball and ducks into it, copping a blow on the helmet. He needs some attention from the physio. Harsh initiation into Test cricket
banged in short and outside off, Masvaure stays leg-side of the ball and jabs it away to cover
banged in short, again, fizzing away outside off. The batsman has his eyes locked on the ball and sways out of harm's way
much fuller and attacking the stumps, Masvaure is reading the lengths well now. He presses forward and dabs it down to close out the over
flatter and sliding down the leg side, away from the reach of the glance
lobbed up on a length on off, forward and driven up to short cover
dragged down outside off, Kasuza jumps back and chops one away to the left of short cover and gets off strike
pushed through on fourth-stump line, defended back to Embuldeniya
fired on off stump, too full, and that's driven down to long-on for a single
tossed on middle, Kasuza backs away outside leg and shovels a single down to long-off to end the over
short and aimed at the body, tickled away with the incoming angle to long leg
nice and full at middle stump, squeezed only as far as mid-off
back of a length on off, stands up tall and punches straight to mid-off with a high elbow
yorker, tailing in at leg stump, chasing Masvaure who was stepping away. He jabs his bat down and inside-edges it between his bat-pad to the fine-leg boundary. Good wheels from Kumara
banged in short and holds its line outside off, the batsman rides the bounce and steers the ball to point

back of a length and holds its line outside off, Masvaure reaches out for the ball with his hands and unleashes a jabbing punch between gully and point. The fielder chases hard, but he finger is on the rope as he aims to haul the ball back into the field of play. Zimbabwe making slow but steady progress
tossed on middle, played back to the bowler
drifting down the leg side, full-toss, tickled only as far as short leg
shorter and skids on outside off, sneaks under Kasuza's cut
slower through the air and dips at middle, Kasuza stretches out in defence
drifts in at off, chipped in the air, but does not carry to mid-on
full and slides on just a shade outside off, blocked back off the front foot
leg-stump full-toss, picked off to the left of midwicket
shorter at the hips, worked away to the leg side
very full and nipping away outside off, Masvaure drives...and misses Loose shot
shortish on middle and leg, dinked to the square-leg region for a single
overpitched and angling into off and middle stumps, nearly flicked past midwicket for a double
shorter and outside off, jabbed to point off the back foot
full on middle, played back
defended back to the bowler again
down the track and driven to the left of the bowler for one
tossed on middle, driven to mid-on's right
sliding down leg, helped to fine leg with a sweep
shorter and angling across off, Masvaure goes back and picks a gap at cover. Punched away for a single
good length and angling away outside off, no shot
short and aimed at the throat, spliced away to cover in awkward fashion
back of a length and slanting away outside off, Masvaure chases and inside-edges it past the leg stump
back of a length and slanting further away outside off, Masuvaure tightens up and lets it go
shorter and outside off, Masvaure latches onto the width, rides the bounce, and chops it between gully and point for four
back of a length and angling across off, Masvaure shoulders arms
tossed on off, defended
on a length and outside off, tapped to cover
fuller on off, defended solidly
tossed on middle, defended
lobbed up outside off, thrashed to extra-cover through the line. Good stop from Oshada
clipped off the toes to square leg
wide half-volley, drilled to sweeper cover
good length and angling back in sharply, worked off the pads to the midwicket region
good length and slanting in on middle, Kasuza ventures forward and blocks to the leg side with a straight bat
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, Kasuza gets right behind the line in defence
short and outside off, swings away after leaving Kasuza, ignored
whipped uppishly...but does not carry to short midwicket
pushed through on off, non-turner, defended
slower through the air, drifts in, inside-edged onto the pad
full and drifts in again, defended
another non-turner, blocked from the crease on middle
looped up on middle, driven off the front foot to mid-off
shorter and breaks away outside off, Masvaure leans back and punches to extra-cover
on a length and slanting in at off stump, Kasuza steadfastly defends back to Rajitha
full and wide, nibbles away further, nothing doing from Kasuza
back of a length and angling in on middle, defended off the back foot
Rajithe ventures wide of the crease, sharply angling in from there and straightening in the channel. Left alone by Kasuza
wide of the crease, once again, this largely holds its line outside off, ignored once again
short and darted at the body, Kasuza goes deep in the crease, and tucks it away behind square on the leg side
he defends the ball back to the bowler
leans forward now and blocks the length ball on off
tossed up, really good length outside off with some turn, reaches out and blocks again
flighted again, this time on middle and leg, and he blocks it back
bit of flight around off, he goes for a big sweep against the turn and dispatches that to the square leg boundary
pretty full outside off, he stretches forward and blocks it
pretty quick towards the stumps, he pushes it back
wider outside off now, pretty flat and pushed into the covers
sends this flat delivery outside off into the covers too
a lot more flight now, slightly full and driven to cover
full around off, driven back to the bowler
some width now outside off, almost a half-volley and he drives to find extra cover at the edge of the circle
length delivery on off stump, he pushes it down with a straight bat
pretty full on the off stump, he blocks on the front foot
pulls the length back and directs this towards leg, he tucks it to square leg
outside off, on good length, he pushes it into the covers
on the pads a bit too much, Kasuza flicks it away with hard hands pretty fine for one
well outside off with the angle, left alone easily
pretty quick and turning in from outside off, pushes it back
reaches forward this time to help the ball to leg with the turn
leans forward and blocks the length ball on off
pulls it shorter and outside off, he goes back and defends this time
bit of flight, still a bit quick, and blocked on off stump
bit slower and outside off, he goes back and punches towards cover point. Another maiden from Dhananjaya
drives the fullish delivery away from the body straight to cover
back of length and angling away from the batsman, he defends off the back foot
trying to use the angle again outside off, Masvaure defends it on off
goes towards the leg side now, Masvaure defends it off the hips
stifled appeal for lbw but the short of length ball pitched outside leg and had some bounce too
goes full this time and he drives it to mid-on
some flight outside off on length, defends on the front foot
much flatter on the stumps, defends to short leg
forward lean now and calls for a quick single straightaway after pushing that delivery down to mid off
defends the length delivery towards the bowler's right
more towards off now, he drives it back to de Silva
much slower around off, slightly full, and he drives it with a flourish to mid off
doesn't quite middle it but drives this length ball to mid off
bangs in a bouncer, Kasuza ducks under it just in time
defends that length delivery from outside off towards cover point
back of length now and outside off, he goes back to steer it to point
this time the short of length ball has more room and he crunches it away, before point dives to his right and save a few runs
tight defensive technique to block that length delivery around off. Another maiden
pretty flat and darting towards off, he opens the face of the bat on the back foot
defends this one too, in front of off stump
shorter and going towards middle, blocked back
big drive from well outside off, some room there but he finds cover
goes fuller now, around off and he blocks it back
lot of flight to end the over, driven away into the covers and he keeps strike
crashes that wide of gully for the ninth four of the day. Short and wide with the angle, Masvaure goes after it and gets a very thick edge to just go wide of gully
using the angle again outside off, he pushes it to cover

drives and that misses the inside edge! That one was coming in with the angle from short of length, some room outside off and he drove hard down the ground but the ball found a big gap between bat and pad, not too far from the stumps
much wider outside off now, left alone
targets the off stump with the short of length delivery from outside off, confident defensive stroke
stays back and defends the ball in front of off
bit slow and turning towards leg from middle, he defends it to leg
cleverly bowled outside off on good length, defends off the back foot
goes back again to block this outside off
turning this one in towards off, punched back to the bowler
forward lean to get the bat forward and head down, blocked back
turning in from around off, pushed down the ground again
slightly full outside off, he blocks it to leg without trouble
pokes and misses! Really good length outside off, Masvaure doesn't move his feet at all and pokes at but and nearly edges
more towards the off stump now, Masvaure blocks it down to leg
bangs this one in short outside off, he lets it go easily
some late swing to bring that one in from outside off, wide of the crease too, he leaves it alone
short ball well outside off, steered towards the vacant point region for one
slightly short outside off, punched off the back foot for one
presses forward and blocks the ball to off
leans forward this time and blocks the length ball back
too short just outside off and Kasuza rocks back to jump on that and crash it to the cover boundary
nearly gets to the length of the ball and blocks it to leg
pitches the ball shorter and Kasuza goes back to defend it again
stays back and taps this short ball from outside off towards backward point
steers this length ball to deep point and gets big cheers from the crowd for his maiden Test fifty, big hug from Kasuza as well
good short ball just outside off, he watches and shoulders arms in the end
little too wide now, bit of away shape and easy leave for Kasuza

bbeaten outside off! Beautiful delivery from Lakmal. It angled in with the action on length just outside off, Kasuza reached forward to defend and the ball straightened with good bounce to nearly take the outside edge
bit more towards the off stump, and Kasuza gets bat to steer it to point
outside off, taps the ball towards point
well flighted but too full on off, driven to cover where a dive to the left saves a run or two
on the pads now, he helps it to midwicket
length delivery around off, he blocks it with a semi-forward lean
goest towards leg now, he works it with the angle to square leg
length ball towards the stumps, blocked back with the straight bat

dropped! A chance at midwicket and looks like it carried to short midwicket. A sharp bouncer from Lakmal around off, and the ball hurried on to Kasuza, who went for the hook to lob the ball to leg where the fielder put in a forward slide and just got his hands under the ball but couldn't hold on
a length delivery that's well outside off and left alone
on the off stump now, he blocks it with a straight bat
some room there, it's a drivable length and he drives it to mid off
bangs it in short now outside off, he goes back and punches it down the ground
on length on off, he blocks with a forward lean
shorter and wider outside off, punches that to cover off the back foot
touch shorter and wider, this time he finds cover point off the back foot
coming in with the angle towards the stumps, he defends it to leg
presses forward and pushes it to cover
flatter outside off, he steers it to point
full and zipping through the channel, left alone outside off
on a length and slanting in at the top of off, defensively pushed away to the right of Kumara
back of a length and skidding through outside off, draws Kasuza into a loose waft and beats the outside edge
lifter on leg stump, Kasuza ducks under it and lets it go
good length on off, driven straight to mid-on
inswinging full-toss, on middle stump, patted to mid-on to close out the over
straighter one outside off, edged away wide of first slip
tossed on off stump, mid-off is up in the circle, Kasuza is wary of it. He runs down the track and lifts it over that infielder for six
slider on middle stump, jabbed back to the spinner
down the track and drilled to the right of mid-off
flatter on off, pushed back to the bowler
much slower on middle, nudged to midwicket
lifter, angling across off, Masvaure sways his upper body out of the way
back of a length and heading into the pads, deflected to the leg side as Masvaure falls over the flick
banged in short and fizzing across off again, Masvaure sways away and lets it go once again
banged in short on off, Masvaure hops, skips, and fends it off
short and wide outside off, Masvaure sits back, expecting this length, and ramps it over gully for four
full and speared in at the stumps, Masvaure gets forward and keeps it out
flatter and fuller on middle, Kasuza shows positive intent. He drops down to one knee and slog-sweeps it in front of square for four
shorter and darted in on middle, goes on the back foot and short-arms it away to midwicket
straighter one, full and attacking the stumps, blocked back
short and spins away outside off, goes back and chops it to backward point
looped up outside off, driven to long-off off the front foot
Kumara runs in hard, hits the deck harder, blocked off the back foot
pitched further up on off, driven to mid-off off the front foot
shorter on off, brings short leg into play, fended off
lifter on leg, Kasuza ducks under it and lets the ball thud into the gloves of the keeper
bouncer, angling across off, Kasuza rocks out of the way once again
short and skidding across off, left alone
flighted on leg stump, played back to the left-arm spinner
down the track and chipped on the bounce to midwicket
dangled up on middle, dead-batted away
length ball on middle, presses forward and blocks it back to the bowler
Masvaure shimmies out and drives straight to mid-off
sliding into the pads, Masvaure can't put it away with a flick and instead wears it on the pad
short and shoved down leg, Kazuka slips out of the way and lets it go
banged in short at the throat from round the stumps, Kazuka ducks under it
short on off, splice-jarring length, hit to mid-off
short at the chest, fended off
banged in short on middle, Kasuza gets up on his ties and pats it down onto the pitch
on a length on middle, Kasuza responds with a back-foot punch to mid-on

Embuldeniya provides SL with a much-needed breakthrough. Dimuth runs from mid-off, dives forward, and completes a smart, low catch. Pushed through outside off, Masvaure dares to dash down the track, but gets too close to the pitch. He chips it to the visiting captain. SL have waited 301 balls for this success
flighted just a shade outside off, played back to the bowler
fuller on middle, defended
shorter on off, defended
length ball on the pads, worked to short midwicket
defended to short leg
on a length and angling in at off stump, squeezed away to midwicket
shorter and slanting away outside off, Ervine drops his gloves and lets it go to Dickwella
back of a length and zipping across off, left alone
punched through the line to mid-off
left alone outside off
dangled up outside off and breaks away, ignored
full on off, smeared away to the right of mid-on
on the pads, Ervine gets off the mark with a neat little clip behind square on the leg side
skidder outside off, blocked to the leg side off the back foot
slower through the air on a fourth-stump line, defended off the front foot
full and outside off, forward and whisked to mid-on
on a length and angling into a stab to midwicket
on the pads, diverted away behind square for one. Leg bye
short and angling across off, Ervine aims to force it through the covers, nearly drags it back onto his stumps
back of a length and angling across off, ignored
banged in short and outside off, fended off
on a length and outside off, patted to extra-cover
full on middle, defended back
shorter on middle, punched to short midwicket
full on middle, shimmies out and slugs it away towards deep midwicket
straighter one on off, defended back stretching forward
tossed outside off and spins away, running past the outside edge as Kasuza drives and does not make contact
full and drifts in from wide of the crease, defended resolutely
shorter and outside off, defended
much fuller on straighter, played back to the bowler
big shout for lbw, not given! Good length from Rajitha, nips back in off the pitch, Ervine is beaten on the inside edge but height seems to be the issue here
shorter and angling away outside off, no shot offered
on a length and on a fourth-stump line, the bat-face turns in his hands as he jabs back to Rajitha
clipped to the left of mid-on for one
back of a length and on middle, Ervine stands tall and forces a single down to long-on
shorter and spins away outside off, chopped off the back foot, Mathews throws himself to his left at short cover and stops the ball
full on middle, blocked to the right of the bowler
shorter and angling across off, chopped away once again, this time in the gap between covers and point
full on the pads, whisked away to the midwicket region
full on middle, stabbed away past the bowler to long-on
back of length outside off, steered to point off the back foot
nice and tight outside off, the line and length, and so is Kasuza with that straight-bat defence
a bouncer now on the off stump, he ducks under it easily
drive and a miss! Teasing length outside off from Rajitha, he goes for a biggish shot but misses
good length around off, no movement, and he blocks it back
another swing and a miss. Rajitha went wide of the crease to end the over, just short of length and well outside off, he could have left it easily but tempted to go for a shot and misses again
pitched up on middle and leg, he defends it back
quicker and a tad shorter on leg, defends it to short leg
pretty flat again, this time on the stumps and he blocks
darts it towards leg stump. he pushes it towards mid-on and they scamper for one
outside leg, worked just past short leg, and they decide not to go for the single
on leg again, pushed down to long-on this time for one
on the pads and he flicks it away towards deep midwicket for a really solid and promising fifty on debut. Big applause for Kevin Jasuza
back of length on off with the angle, he defends off the back foot
on the leg side now, goes off Ervine's pad to square leg and they steal a single in the end
outside off and not much movement, he lets it go
goes for the off stump now, he stays on the back foot and defends on off
some late swing there to end the over. On length and shaping away, well outside off to let it go
pretty flat on off, he defends it back
darts it towards the stumps again, and blocked again
full on the pads now, he squeezes it out to mid-on
slower through the air towards off, forward press and a thick edge rolls towards gully
nice and tight on the stumps, blocked off the forward stretch
smashed down the ground to break the shackles! Flighted delivery unlike the first five balls, pitched up as well and Ervince crunched it over the bowler's head with a big swing
angling into the pads, worked towards midwicket for one
punches this back of of length delivery off the back foot, a misfield at cover gives them two
full and straight on the stumps, Ervine middles it to mid on
closes his bat to work this to leg from off for a single
short and wide outside off, some away swing too and left alone easily
solid forward=press defence on off to end the over
darts it in towards middle from around the wicket, Ervine blocks it back
and another six! Too full from de Silva and Ervine is not holding back. A tiny front foot stride, sees the half-volley and swings that over long on
fullish on middle and leg, he reaches out and drives it back
still fairly flat and angling in, he blocks it back
fullish on the stumps and pushes it back again
waits for the ball to come to him and blocks with a compact defence
hint of away swing outside off, back of length and he steers it to point
here's the bouncer and Kasuza hasn't had any trouble ducking under them. Does that again
doesn't quite middle that drive on the off side, and finds cover
some width on offer and he punches it off the back foot in the gap. Easy two for these two
nice and tight towards the off stump, he stays back and defends nicely
short and wide, crunched off the back foot beyond point and the slow outfield doesn't let it go for four. Two more
bit of forward press and blocked on the leg side
leans out again toward the ball and drives that nicely, straight to point
slightly straight with the angle from around the wicket, he lets it go outside off
tad shorter and angling in towards the stumps, worked to midwicket
short and flat outside off, punched back
similar delivery around off, he rocks back and crunches that down the ground. Mathews dives to his right to save a run or two
well outside off with some shape, left alone
not much bounce but it shapes away again from outside off to be left again
forward press to cover the off stump, and blocks that solidly
outside off on length, he keeps the bat close to his body and blocks
the nagging line outside off, he stays patient and dead-bats it back
slower, fuller and outside off, left alone easily
nicely flighted around off from wide of the crease, he pushes it back
presses forward and towards off, blocked again
what a drive he has middled for six over the covers! That fullish length again from de Silva, just a bit of width and Ervine smashed it inside out for his third six off de Silva
this one towards the stumps, he dead-bats it back
bit of forward press and blocks it back
straight bat for the fuller delivery, punches it back
around the fourth-stump line, he stays back and presents the straight bat
bit of away shape outside off, it's not bouncing as much and he lets it go
almost walks towards off to cover the stumps and works it to leg
punches it back nicely after Lakmal pitches it on short of length outside off. No movement there
pretty full on the stumps now, he middles it down to mid-on
accurate delivery for top of off stump, but Kasuza is there to defend it in front of the crease
quick outside off, he punches it back
flighted outside off, it's full too and he unleashes a reverse sweep for the vacant area behind square on the off side
turns it in a bit towards middle and leg, he goes back and helps it behind square on the other side this time for two
goes back for the widish delivery outside off and taps it late towards the gully region
drifting a bit towards the legs, drives it down to mid on
leans forward towards the pitch of the ball outside off, pushes it into the covers and takes one
short outside off with the angle, Ervine drops his hands from the line of the ball just in time
goes for the off stump line this time and Ervine defends it back
just outside off now, pushed into the off side
<b>loud appeal for lbw<b/> as Ervine is falling over! Lakmal using the angle from wide of the crease around the wicket and it beats Ervine who takes it on the pad, but it's probably going down leg
on the back foot and he defends it towards cover
angling in sharply towards the pads again, a bit too full and this time Ervine flicks it away
covers the off stump and defends the ball with the turn to leg
steps down this time and loses his balance after blocking the ball to off
stays back this time as the bowler targets off, he turns it to leg again
tad shorter, turning in again and he closes the face of the bat yet again to block it
goes back in the crease and punches that with the turn down to long on
drives this fuller delivery down towards long on for one
bangs it in short first up around off and he blocks off the back foot
short of length with some width and he steers it past point with a late tap, for two in the gap
opens the face and defends this incoming delivery to point
coming in sharply towards the stumps from outside off, he stays back and defends at the last moment
short of length, not much room, Kasuza wants to cut it away but misses. Not far from the outside edge
slashes it nicely this time off the back foot behind square and he gets two
flighted on off stump, Ervine nurdles to short midwicket off the front foot
pushed through faster and flatter on off, defended from the crease
fuller on middle and leg, knocked to square leg
slider outside off, pushed back down the pitch
flighted outside off, deftly paddled away towards long leg
pushed through outside off, squirted to the covers with an open face
dug in short and outside off, rushes Ervine for pace and bounce, flapped to midwicket in the end
Kumara thinks he has Ervine, but the umpire shoots down the caught-behind appeal. Short and down leg, Ervine doesn't connect with a pull. He doesn't touch the ball
shorter and on a fourth-stump line, defended
back of a length and outside off, punched out to mid-off off the back foot
shorter and outside off, Ervine swivels on the back foot and controls a hook to long leg
slower ball, floated outside off, Kasuza delays his drive and strokes it to mid-off
fuller on off, defended off the front foot
looped up outside off, worked away to short midwicket
really full and heading down leg side, swept flat and hard behind square for four
back of a length and sliding in, tapped to midwicket
looped up outside off, drilled down to long-off
lifter on middle, Kasuza ducks under it
back of a length on off, stabbed away to the bowler's right

Kumara surprises Kasuza with a rapid full-toss. Nice and full - it's a full-toss in fact - (reverse)swings in so very late, beats the inside edge and pings the back pad in line with off. The batsman plays around it and misses. Kasuza was rather late to pick it up and has to exit, having soaked up 214 balls for his 63
back of a length and tailing in at off, Taylor almost drags it back onto the stumps. Kumara is posing a threat with the old ball
back of a length and outside off, slashes and misses
flighted and outside off, patted down to long-on, beating short midwicket to his right
pushed through on off, Taylor bends forward in defence
flighted on middle, down the track and quietly defended
an appeal for lbw, Taylor weathers it. He uses his feet, the ball grazes the pad, before he makes any contact with the bat. Or was it bat first?
fizzes in at off, defended
Taylor gets off the mark with a mighty six. He runs down the track, meets the pitch of the ball and muscles it over mid-on for six
bouncer aimed at the head, Ervine ponders about a hook before belatedly withdrawing
short on the hips, gets inside the line and pull-whips it away to long leg
short and outside off, no shot
back of a length and outside off, left alone once again
Taylor gets on top of a short one outside off and punches through the covers
slower cutter outside off, run away to slip with ultra-soft hands
arm ball outside off, Taylor leans back and chops to point
in-drifter, finishes on middle, defended back to the bowler
drifting down leg this time as Taylor misses the sweep
full on off, driven back to the bowler, who dives to his right to stop the ball
whipped in the air but to the right of midwicket
pushed through on middle, Taylor lines it up and drills it in the air to the right of mid-on for four
shorter and angling across off, Ervine closes the face and squeezes the ball to midwicket
on a length and swerves back in at off, keeps low, toe-ended back to the bowler
lifter outside off, Ervine sinks under it
full on the pads, glanced through square leg
short and heading down the leg side, deflected away off the pads to long leg
lifter down leg, the batsman shuffles inside the line and lets it go
short and wide, flayed past the covers for a couple of runs. That's fifty off 100 balls for Ervine and he celebrates in front of his adoring family
full and swings in on middle, Ervine stretches out and drives firmly to mid-on
back of a length on off, stabbed away to cover
full-toss on off, hint of swing, but Ervine leans on it and drives it straight past the bowler for four
full on middle, worked to midwicket
yorker on off from round the wicket, jammed out to mid-off
full and floated on off stump, blocked
pitched up and holds its line outside off, driven to mid-off
short and nips away outside off, no shot
short on middle, blocked
fuller and nipping in at off, Taylor covers up in defence
full on off, nudged to the leg side
full and angling across off, Ervine watches it through to the keeper
good length and angling in at off stump, Ervine gets forward and negotiates it well
lifter angling in at the head, Ervine ducks under it
short and angling in at the top of off, Ervine protects it with a solid back-foot defence
full and swinging into the pads, picked away to fine leg
full and swerving into the pads, Ervine plays around his front pad and falls over the flick, but this is surely heading past leg stump
short, wide - wider than a set of stumps outside off - left alone
full on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
on a length on off, forced back to the bowler
full outswinger, left alone outside off
full, angling in and then straightening past the outside edge as Ervine pokes at it
back of a length and hits the splice, defended on off stump

pitched further up on off stump, tapped away straight of mid-off for the first runs on the second day. Chadimal throws himself to his right from mid-off, and seems to have hurt his finger while diving across. He winces in pain and is being taken off the field. Big injury scare for Chandimal
off-stump yorker, at the base of off, dug out
good length, threatens to angle in at off, but straightens away outside off. Ervine plays inside the line of it and allows himself to get beaten
banged in short and outside off, nowhere near close enough to off stump to make Ervine play
short at off, cramps Ervine for room, he rides the bounce and secures a single to deep square leg
fullish and slanting away outside off, driven off the front foot to mid-on
full and pushed across off once again, Ervine plays inside the line and lets it pass
What a way to bring up 1000 Test runs! Pitched up and outside off, Ervine leans into the drive and middles it straight of mid-off. Classy shot
good length and angling in at off, defended
jabbed away to extra-cover now

inswinging yorker, angling in, swerving in from round the wicket, Ervine plays all around it and falls over. However, this is heading past leg stump with the sharp angle and therefore Ervine weathers the lbw appeal
on a length and outside off, Taylor deploys a strong stride and pushes to cover
chest-high short ball, angling in from over the wicket, Taylor half-heartedly hooks to long leg. More of a flap than a hook
on a length and just a shade outside off, patted to mid-on off the front foot
banged in short on off, Ervine hops, skips and fends it to the leg side
chest-high short ball on leg stump, swatted to deep square leg off the back foot
short and outside off, no shot offered
on a length and holds its line outside off, Taylor fishes in the channel and almost drags it back onto the stumps
full outswinger outside off, Taylor reads it and ignores it
overpitched and outside off, driven through the line to mid-off
overpitched and outside off again, this time Taylor picks the gap to the left of mid-off
on a length and outside off, lashed away between point and cover for a double. 200 up for Zimbabwe
inswinger on off from round the wicket, Ervine keeps it out

dug in short at the throat, fended off to the right of short leg. There's a mix-up between the wickets. Ervine searches for a single, but Taylor sends him back. And he gets back by the time Karunaratne throws the stumps down at the non-striker's end. They eventually find a single via a ricochet
good length on middle, resolutely defended by Ervine
wide yorker, squeezes under Ervine's bat
another yorker, this tails in at leg stump, jammed out to square leg
back of a length and holds its line outside off, no shot
Taylor gets on top of a short ball outside off and punches a single to the left of cover
full and slanting in at off, can't breach Taylor's strong defences
full and nibbles away outside off, run away to the cordon with soft hands
overpitched and outside off, crunched through the line for three. Driven through the covers
full and angling in at off, played back to Lakmal
full on off, blocked
full and holds its line outside off, ignored
back of a length and jags back in, Taylor defends it away
banged in short and climbs at off, Taylor rises with it and pats it down onto the pitch
shorter and outside off, Taylor stays leg-side of the ball, swishes and misses
the short-ball barrage continues, Taylor diffuses it once again
short of a length and outside off, Taylor jabs it back to the bowler
dug in short at the body, Taylor rides the bounce and keeps it out
back of a length and outside off, gently run away towards point
pitched up and outside off, speared away to the right of mid-off
full on off, Taylor covers up in defence
Lakmal pins Taylor lbw. Full inswinger, shapes back in just enough to have Taylor playing around his front pad and falling over. Hit bang in front of middle and Taylor has to leave
back of a length and outside off, ignored
slides in on middle, dead-batted away
worked with the incoming angle in front of square for a brace
tossed on middle, played back to the bowler
short and skids back in, forced off back foot to short midwicket
slapped off the back foot to point
back of a length on the thigh, glanced to square leg off the back foot
back of a length and outside off, stabbed to cover
shortish inducker, an inside edge whizzes past leg stump
on a length and skids back in off the pitch to ping the thigh but this seems to be sliding down leg with the angle from round the wicket
full on middle and leg, neatly clipped to the left of mid-on
picked off the pads to Kumara at long leg
tossed outside off, stretches out in defence
full and pushed through on off, blocked off the front foot once again
drifts in to catch the pad, but heading down leg with the round-the-wicket angle
flighted on off, pushed back to de Silva
full and attacking the stumps, defended off the front foot to the off side
fired outside off, kept out
full and holds its line outside off, ignored
short and outside off, steered off the face to point
on a length and on a sixth-stump line outside off, left alone
Lakmal brings this length ball back into the left-hander, but goes too straight, picked off through square leg
back of a length on off, Williams gets right behind the line in defence
full inswinger, jammed to short midwicket
full and outside off, squirted to cover, front-foot no-ball from de Silva
pushed through outside off, Ervine stretches out and drills it away, putting umpire Erasmus in the firing line. He cops a blow on his forearm and Erasmus suggests he's fine
fuller on off, blocked
tossed on off, dinked to point
flighted and holds its line outside off, driven to extra-cover off the front foot
straighter one, attacking the stumps, pushed back down the pitch
slower through the air on middle, dead-batted away
straight, fuller, and he defends
length, angles across him, and he defends towards cover
fuller, and he drives hard, but straight towards mid-off
dug in short, and down the leg side, and he works this away towards fine leg
a little short of a length, and dies on Williams as he looks to defend. Angles across him, and goes on the bounce through to the keeper
ooh, a beauty! Slants across him from a good length, goes from middle to off, and beats the outside edge. Rajitha holds his head. That was close!
presses forward to defend a length ball around off
full, and he stretches forward to defend
fuller, straighter, and he defends towards a man at silly mid-on
whips one towards short mid-wicket
presses forward to defend a length ball
full, and he drives this down towards long-on
length, a bit of width, and he drives hard. Cut off at cover, and gets a deflection on towards mid-off
straighter ball, angles across him from the leg stump, and he defends towards short mid-wicket
short, angles across him, and he rises on his toes to defend this
fuller length, driven to mid-on
length, outside off, and he leaves
length, angles in, and he defends
length, defended
fired in flatter, and he defends
stretches forward to defend. The bowler oversteps, a bad thing for a spinner
presses forward to defend a length ball
tossed up, around off, and he has smacked this straight back over long-on. Right in his arc, and he's happy to go with a straight bat at it
length, and he eases this towards deep mid-on
presses forward to smother a length ball
length, angles across, and he defends this between gully and point
length, angles across, and he goes back to defend this close to his body
fuller, and he looks to drive this. Off the inner edge, and on to his boot. Could have gone on back to hit the stumps, but didn't go there, thankfully for Williams
length, around off, and he leaves. Not far from the off stump, as a matter of fact!
full, driven towards short cover
full, a bit wide, and he looks to drive. Miscues it straight back towards the bowler, but along the ground
tossed up around off, and he drives hard, but towards the man at wide cover
fuller, driven towards cover
drives a length ball back towards the bowler with a forward press
full toss, and he spanks this through covers. Lakmal runs around from the long-off boundary and keeps the scoring down to two
terrific shot! Skips down the wicket and smacks this straight back. Places it to the left of Lakmal, and hit well enough to beat the fast bowler's dive at long-off
presses forward to defend a length ball
length, angles across Williams, who leaves
length, jags back in, and he defends
length, but wide outside off. Left alone
wide of the crease, fired in straight, and he defends watchfully from the crease
good shot! Full, and wide, and he seems to have waited for it. Hangs back, and spanks it through the extra cover region
short, and he gets the pull going. Almost gets the better of deep backward square leg, but the man there scrambles away to his right to save two
length, and he goes back and punches it back towards the bowler
drives a length ball back towards the bowler
presses forward to a length ball, and places it to the right of short cover
tossed up, around off, and he leaves it. Doesn't turn much, and goes on with some good bounce through to Dickwella
streaky! Stretches forward to one tossed up around off. This doesn't turn at all, and takes the outside edge, but runs past first slip and goes towards third man
punches a length ball away towards extra cover
defends a length ball
works a length ball away towards fine leg
full ball, angles in towards him, and he flicks this away towards mid-wicket
full, driven hard, but back towards Rajitha. He picks it up on his follow-through
length, but wide across off, and he leaves. Angles across him, and he is not tempted into considering any action on that
length, around off, and he defends
ooh, well bowled! Plays inside the line of one tossed up around off. Just past the outside edge
length, and he plays this with the turn towards square leg

there's the breakthrough! Embuldeniya has threatened the inside and outside edges of both batsmen, and this time some extra bounce does Williams in. Stretches forward to meet one tossed up outside off, and it takes a feather edge through to Dickwella
length, defends
length ball, defended
defends, stretching forward
length ball, left alone

oh my, this is completely Sri Lanka's session now, if it wasn't already! The decision to bring Lakmal back on pays dividends immediately, and it's the prize scalp of the well-set Ervine. Just a bit of nip back in, and that does enough to go through his defence, with a little inside edge as he tries to punch this towards cover
defends a back-of-a-length ball from the crease
length, outside off, and he leaves it alone
worked away off his hips towards deep fine leg
presses forward to defend
driven back towards the bowler
smack this hard, and it strikes Oshada Fernando at silly point!
that's a good shot. Goes back and cuts this away, using the depth of the crease
works this around the corner with a whip of the wrists
defends a length ball around off
short of a length, but he anticipates it perfectly. Rocks right back, and pulls this away towards long leg. Well played!
length, presses forward to defend
whips one off his pads towards long leg
length, around off, and he taps this towards cover
length, around off, and he defends
length, around off, and he drives back towards the bowler. Delivered from wide of the crease
dangled up on off stump, dead-batted away
slower through the air and drifts in at off stump, played back to him
shorter and spins away a wee bit outside off, chopped to point off the back foot
fired outside off, blocked back off the front foot
short, breaks away outside off, the extra bounce takes it past the attempted cut
slider on middle, defensively worked to the leg side and that's a maiden post lunch
full and on a fourth-stump line, pushed back to Lakmal off the front foot
full and homing in on a fourth-stump line, Raza stretches out in defence
clipped away with the incoming angle in the gap between square leg and short midwicket
pitched up and outside off, drilled straight of mid-off for a brace
short and slanting in on middle, Raza goes back and across as he blocks
nip-backer from Lakmal, snakes back in sharply, grazes the trouser and carries through to the keeper. No bat involved as Raza surives the appeal
arm ball on middle, knocked away to the left of short leg
skids on outside off, jabbed off the back foot to cover
slower through the air and spins away outside off, ignored
on a length and on a fourth-stump line, blocked from the crease
on a length and slanting in on off, defended back with a straight bat
fullish and outside off, played up to cover
pitched up and nips away outside off, no shot
full and straight, turned to midwicket
full on off, defended back
very full on off, stabbed back to Lakmal, who stretches to his right and takes some pace off the ball, deflecting it to mid-off

Mathews plunges forward from mid-on and takes a smart catch. Tossed up on off, Chakabva ventures down the track to drill it away. Instead, he chips it to mid-on. The ball dips on Mathews, but he dives to grasp the catch
fuller on off, defended off the front foot
jabbed back to the bowler
slower through the air on off, guided to cover off the front foot
length, around off, and he defends coming forward
short, angles in at good pace, and he defends from the crease
angles in, and he taps this towards cover. Played with soft hands, and they call each other through for a quick single

short, and this seems to have hit him! Jags back into him, and he looks to take evasive action, but that comes in hard and hits his helmet grille. Might have a concussion test for him here. Seems to be ok. Holds his thumb up for the physio who rushed out immediately
short ball, down the leg side, and he flicks this away towards fine leg. Well done, to get inside the line of that
short, and swift, and strikes him on the left hand. Raza looks to duck inside this, and that comes on quickly on to him and pings him on the inside of the ribs. Superb fast bowling from Kumara!
length ball, fired down the leg stump, and he looks to flick and is beaten. Going down leg, though
length, goes back and punches this towards cover
presses forward to defend a length ball around off
stretches to defend a length ball
goes back and defends a length ball around off
goes back to a faster one. Able to keep it out, as it rifles in towards his pads. Played with the bat, as he scrambles to meet it
short, and he goes back to defend
back of a length, defended towards point
length, and he hangs back and smacks this through covers. Terrific shot, but the ball pulls up well inside the boundary
short, angles in, and he plays this away towards deep square leg, riding the bounce with a little hop across the crease
back of a length, moves back in, and he defends from the crease
fuller, and he defends this. Squirts it away towards point
length, and he paddles this around the corner to fine leg. Some quick running gets him two
length, and he goes back and defends
short, and he goes back to punch this towards cover
presses forward to defend
skips down the wicket, and bashes this through covers. A lot of power behind that shot, and good intentions to keep the scoreboard ticking!
short, and he defends from the crease
straying into the hips, glanced away fine on the leg side for four
slower through the air on off, dead-batted away
pushed through on off stump, played back to the bowler
full-toss on middle, jammed to cover
looped up on middle stump, dead-batted away
fuller and sliding in at off stump, Tiripano opens the face and runs the ball to cover-point region
dangled up outside off, hint of turn for Embuldeniya, glided away past slip for one

back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, guided off the back foot to point
on a length and straight in line, tucked only as far as midwicket
banged in short and homing in at the throat, Tiripano hops and fends it off to the leg side
shortish and outside off, punched back to the bowler off the back foot
pitched up on off, jammed out
flighted and outside off. Here comes Raza: down the track and carts it over the bowler's head with great authority
shorter and outside off, spins away further, carved off the back foot to point
on a length and outside off, whisked away to mid-off
fired outside off, jabbed away in front of point
shorter and outside off, slapped to backward point
sliding on off, squeezed out
good length and slanting in at off stump, pushed back down the pitch
full and outside off, pushed to mid-off
shorter and outside off, run away to the cover-point region
banged in short and at the body, flapped away fine past the keeper for four. Rajitha has a wry smile on his face
on a length and outside off, flashed off the front foot through extra-cover
off-stump yorker, kept out
drifts in on middle, defended back
looped up on middle and leg, Raza bends forward in defence
slider on middle, fizzes off the pitch, defended back
full and outside off, driven through cover-point region
slower through the air and outside off, dabbed to short cover
fuller on off, Tiripano bends forward in defence
fullish and outside off, glided away to point
lifter outside off, Raza gets out of the way
tight line on off, played back down the pitch
worked to midwicket
wide of the crease, holds its line outside off, stabbed to the leg side off the inside half
shorter and outside off, slapped to mid-off
over the wicket, and he presses forward to defend
pulls out the reverse sweep. Placed well, as he puts one pitching outside leg towards third man
advances down the wicket, and looks to smother the ball. Off the inside edge, on to pad

that's the one they would have wanted! Raza skips down the wicket, but Embludeniya has floated this a touch wide. He misses with a wilde swipe and it turns away from his outside edge. He is well short when Dickwella whips off the bails
presses forward to defend a length ball around off
fired in a bit flatter, and he defends this from the crease
fuller, around off, and he presses forward to defend
short, down the leg side a bit, and he ducks under this comfortably
short, and he defends from the crease as the ball nips back in a touch
full, a touch wide, and he leans into a gorgeous cover drive. Fielded by the man at extra cover, moving away to his right
short, but wide of off, and he leaves
length, and he backs away a bit, and taps it towards cover. They can pinch a single for this

five for Embludeniya! Straighter ball, delightfully floated up around middle, and Jarvis stretches forward. He looks for the turn across him, and in the process lets a substantial gap in between bat and pad, and that's exactly where the ball goes. Embuldeniya nonchalantly accepts his team's congratulations, but this has been a potentially match-turning spell. Guile, precision, and smarts
defends a length ball, coming forward
presses forward to defend a length ball
struck on the pads as he goes back to play this. Off the inside edge, though
goes back and defends one that straightens from leg stump. Pushed towards mid-on
defends one from the crease
outside off, left alone
full ball, straight, and he drives this back. Beats mid-on, but this will pull up ahead of the long-on boundary
full, but down the leg side. Hurries on to Tiripano as he looks to whip this away. Off the thigh pad to the left of leg gully
length, around off, and he gets behind the line to defend
short, and he goes back to defend
floated full and wide, and left alone

defended from the crease

wide of the crease, rifled in towards middle, and he defends

length, and he looks to steer towards third man. Intercepted by gully
short, and he hangs back and whips this away towards deep backward square leg. Good shot, as the ball didn't have a lot of pace or bounce, and deserved some treatment!
length, and he presses forward to defend

length, down the leg side, and Ndlovu gets struck on the pads as he looks to defend

flighted around off, and he plays a slog-sweep through mid-wicket. First runs in Test cricket, and in some style!
defends from the crease, towards mid-on
goes back to defend a length ball that straightens from around leg and middle
presses forward to defend a length ball around middle
back of a length, and he goes back to whip this towards short leg, along the ground
short, well directed, and he ducks under this one as it goes over his left shoulder. Good pace being worked up again by Kumara!
presses forward to defend a ball pitched further up
short, and he is able to negotiate this with a hop. Played towards square leg. Chooses not to take a single
back of a length, and he shuffles across to whip this away. Doesn't beat the man at leg gully, though
controlled pull shot to a short ball. Keeps it wide of short leg, and runs it down towards long leg
stretches forward to defend a length ball
length ball, played towards short leg, with soft hands
presses forward and drives to cover
whips a fuller ball towards mid-wicket

a touch wide, and he has cut this hard. Past point, and this has the legs to get to the fence!
back of a length, but just outside off, and he stretches forward and leaves
short, wide, and left duly alone
short, and he hangs back and plays this towards point
dug in short, across him, but he gets up on his toes to play this towards mid-wicket
short, angles across him, and he leaves
short, directed at his left shoulder, but he can duck under this
presses forward and smothers one tossed up around leg and middle

fired down the leg side. He looks to stretch to defend, and it comes off the inside edge and runs down towards fine leg
fired down the leg side, and he leaves this
looks for the reverse sweep, but misses. Loud appeal for leg before, but that would have gone down the leg side

that's the breakthrough! Short leg has taken an absolute blinder! This was bowled fuller by Kumara, and Ndlovu has whipped this off his pads. It has just gone straight into the midriff of Mendis. Sri Lanka celebrate this with abandon, as a dour stand comes to an end.
short, and he has a waft, and misses
fuller, faster, and he taps this towards cover. Tiripano calls him through for a single
full, and driven handsomely down the ground. Equally good stop by Lakmal at mid-on, stretching low to his left
fuller ball, drilled back to the bowler

ooh, is that a drop? Length, outside off, and he edges this towards first slip. Nearly carried to the fielder's fingertips. There's confusion in the middle, with both batsmen winding up at the same end, but the throw is absolutely shocking! It goes on to the other side of the field, without any backing up, and they are able to run some extra runs! So two for the intial runs, and three overthrows taken by the two players
reverse sweep, and a smart one. Played low and flat towards third man
presses forward to defend a length ball
lobs this towards long-on, and picks up the single this time
quicker ball, but fired down the leg side
goes back to defend from the crease
length, straightens after pitching, and he defends from the crease
short, and punched to cover
length, and he hangs back to punch this towards cover point

smacks a length ball down the ground. Gets it past mid-off, but there's a great effort from the fielder there, who chases it all the way to the extra cover boundary, and pulls it back himself. Rajitha the fielder there
fast ball, angles in to him from just a little back of a length. Nyauchi looks to defend, and is hurried on with that. Off the inside edge and down to ground, towards short leg
length, and he backs away and has a wild swipe. No contact!
looks for the yorker, but he has squeezed this out. Defended towards point.
length, and he presses forward to defend
